desc: The Soul Store brings to you a fine collection of curated crystals, pyramids, bracelets and other artifacts from around to world providing peace, prosperity, protection, wealth, health and happiness to you and your homes.

layout.text:
We are a group of awakened Lightworkers from across the world with an aim to touch the lives of 1 million souls in the next decade. With over 150 years of combined experience in Chakra Healing & Alignment, Energy Medicine, Reiki, Tarot Reading, Astrology and Manifestations, we strive daily to bring you the healing and abundance solutions to help you in your journey to move closer to your higher-self and live the life you envision.
During our journey of healing 10,000+ lives, some simple solutions really stand out and work miracles in the lives of everyone. We hope to bring you the same solutions for your alignment, healing and manifestations through our carefully handcrafted and Reiki infused Energy Pyramids, Crystal Wands, Energy Pendants and other Accessories.
